section.title: What do I need to start creating on Inkarnate?
section.p: You’ll just need an Inkarnate account and an internet connection.
Get started by signing up for Inkarnate with one of our plans (there’s a free version too!). Then create your first map and start bringing your worlds to life.
Our Reddit user community will be happy to assist you with feedback on finished creations.

section.title: Can I download my maps?
section.p: Yes, you can! All maps can be exported as images, ready to be used online or printed in your tabletop games or books.

section.title: Can I use Inkarnate offline?
section.p: No, at the moment for using Inkarnate you'll need to have Internet connection.
